name: Adiba
wishText: Hopefully i can have another fun year with Adiba
textInChatBox: Happy new year to adiba, send my regards to milly too
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Congratulations to charming Adiba for making this far.
replayText: Click this, if Adiba want to replay it again.
